observation: Specialty Investment Bank | Ziegler  Skip to main content Skip to footer Ziegler Menu What We Do Expand sub pages What We Do Investment Banking Expand sub pages Investment Banking Healthcare Organizations Expand sub pages Healthcare Organizations Hospitals & Health Systems Healthcare Services & Outsourcing Healthcare Information Technology Physician Groups Radiology Senior Living Expand sub pages Senior Living Multi-Site Senior Living Senior Housing & Care Educational Institutions Expand sub pages Educational Institutions Charter Schools K-12 Private Schools Colleges & Universities General Municipal & Structured Finance State & Local Governments Governmental Agencies Data Center Developers Solar Power & Waste To Energy Developers Our Team FHA/HUD Mortgage Lending Expand sub pages FHA/HUD Mortgage Lending Senior Housing Multifamily/Apartments Capital Markets Expand sub pages Capital Markets Sales & Trading Principal Investments & Fund Management Our Funds John Hopper Impact Award Ziegler Credit Surveillance & Analytics Who We Are History People & Culture Business Leaders Executive Team Careers Our Services Expand sub pages Our Services Proprietary Investments Newsroom Contact Broker Check Expand Search Pause Play Previous A SPECIALTY INVESTMENT BANK #1 IN SENIOR LIVING FINANCING Learn More HEALTHCARE/SENIOR LIVING TOP 20 MUNICIPAL UNDERWRITERS RANKED #3 IN HEALTHCARE M&A HEALTHCARE ADVISORY SPECIALISTS COMPREHENSIVE HEATHCARE APPROACH BRINGING TWO WORLDS TOGETHER CAPITAL MARKETS RANKED #4 IN HEALTHCARE FINANCING ZIEGLER FINANCING CORPORATION FHA/HUD EXPERTISE Next Go to slide 1 WHO WE ARE Ziegler is a privately held investment bank, capital markets and proprietary investments firm. Specializing in the healthcare, senior living and education sectors, as well as general municipal and structured finance, enables us to generate a positive impact on the communities we serve. Headquartered in Chicago with regional and branch offices throughout the U.S., Ziegler provides its clients with capital raising, strategic advisory services, equity and fixed income sales & trading and research. CLIENTS WE SERVE THROUGH INVESTMENT BANKING, CORPORATE FINANCE & FHA/HUD MORTGAGE LENDING HOSPITALS & HEALTH SYSTEMS HEALTHCARE SERVICES & OUTSOURCING HEALTHCARE INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY (HIT) MULTI-SITE SENIOR LIVING POST-ACUTE CARE HIGHER EDUCATION CHARTER SCHOOLS & PRIVATE K-12 GENERAL MUNICIPAL & STRUCTURED FINANCE WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY Ziegler did a fine job of underwriting, coordination, and negotiation and was able to leverage our strong credit profile to meet our financing needs.* Jack Wagner The Ziegler team was able to deliver flexible and tailored financial services to Pledgerville. Their passion and commitment to our interests, objectives and principles of integrity truly surpassed our expectations.* Leroy Geter Ziegler was instrumental not only in finding a qualified successor for Harmony, but introduced the Wisconsin assisted living community to a rapidly growing and well-regarded public company like Ensign.* Mike Smith With deep domain expertise and a fundamental understanding of PhySynergy's value proposition, the Ziegler team provided the key strategic advice and execution- focus that allowed us to efficiently and optimally achieve our desired objective.* Dr. Tim Adams I do not know how we could have done this without Ziegler. They were with us every step of the way. I’ve never heard of an investment bank going so far to support a charter school.* Matt Shaw *This client’s experience may not be representative of the experience of other clients, nor is it indicative of future performance or success. NEWS ROOM February 1, 2024 Modern Healthcare Sponsorship | Health Care M&A Insights: Q4 2023 & Outlook for 2024 Deal Activity April 19, 2024 Ziegler Advises Retirement Housing Foundation on the Sale of 15-Community Portfolio Z-News | Senior Living Finance: The 2024 Ziegler LeadingAge National CFO Workshop Ziegler Publishes Pediatric Healthcare White Paper Ziegler CFO Hotline Report: Executive Incentive Compensation September 21, 2023 LeadingAge Ziegler 200 (LZ 200) Publication VIEW MORE NEWS Experience the Ziegler difference and get started today. CONTACT US Locations Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion Connect With Us 800 366 8899 One North Wacker Drive THE CHICAGO NETWORK EQUITY PLEDGE PARTNER Supporting gender equity at all levels with The Chicago Network This site has been published in the United States for residents of the United States. thought: The WHOIS information confirms that the domain ziegler.com has been registered since 1995 and the domain registration is not expiring soon. It is also protected by a privacy service, which is common for legitimate businesses to protect from spam. The registrar is a well-known company, Network Solutions, LLC. There are no immediate red flags here. To further validate the legitimacy of the website, I will check for SSL certificate details to ensure secure communication and see if the certificate is valid and properly issued.

thought: The SSL certificate details indicate that the certificates for the domain ziegler.com have been issued by a reputable Certificate Authority (DigiCert Inc) and are valid from April 25, 2024, to May 26, 2025. This suggests that the website has a secure connection and the owners have taken steps to ensure the security of communication, which is a good sign of legitimacy. At this point, I have no significant evidence to conclude that https://www.ziegler.com/ is a scam website. The information presented on the site appears to be legitimate, the domain has a long history and is registered with a reputable service, and the SSL certificates are valid and appropriately issued. I now know the final answer. Based on the analysis, https://www.ziegler.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website is for a legitimate company specializing in investment banking services has a long-standing domain registration uses a recognized privacy service and has valid SSL certificates issued by a reputable Certificate Authority. No evidence of scam characteristics such as unusually low prices unrealistic money claims or suspicious content was found.
